message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to let it go for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75.
I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $75. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $85.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $78. I can offer you a deal at $82.50, and that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $82.50, but I was thinking more along the lines of $77.50.

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated that we're not meeting in the middle. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get at least $82. I can offer you the product for $81.25. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78.

I'm starting to think we're not going to meet on price, Bob. I'm willing to make one final offer, but I need to get at least $82. I can offer you the product for $80.50. That's my absolute final offer.
I've made it clear what I'm willing to pay, and I'm not willing to go above $78. I'm willing to accept your product at $78.
